sense.gloss: amazing (e.g. of strength), great (e.g. of skills), wonderful, terrific
to a great extent, vast (in numbers)

sdata.j: そのこと↑話↑↓はな↓してよ。|すっごい|↑聞↑↓き↓きたいんだけど。
sdata.e: Tell me about it. I'm all ears.

sdata.j: あ、あれ？なんか・・・|すっごい|↑負↑↓まけ↓のオーラを↑感↑↓かん↓じますよ？
sdata.e: E-eh? I somehow seem to feel a very threatening aura...
